column1: I can NOT prove this to be true, but the source I got this collection from claimed to me it was an expensive GOLD PLATED discs from one of the two major remixing companies. Indeed the picture of the cover supplied to me did appear to claim to of been a remixed gold CD- But I can find almost no information of this online, so I can not confirm it to be true as I never seen the source CD.

column2: Come to Poppa"" (Earl Randle, Willie Mitchell)
